ygData.subject: RE: NPC's Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Exactly! I ve gotten to the point where I have 2 bind points that I bounce back and forth between: Faydwer (anywhere) and Antonica (anywhere). Did I
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> As you get higher level, you will forget less and less about binding. The
> other night I went back to Freeport from Mistmoore and you know what? I had
> no idea where I was bound - thats how long it had been. I did auction that
> I was looking for a bound and a kindly female woodelf did me the favor
> (took less than 2 minutes off the boat).


Exactly! I've gotten to the point where I have 2 bind points that I bounce back
and forth between: Faydwer (anywhere) and Antonica (anywhere). Did I mention I
really hate the Freeport/Butcherblock boat route? :-)

Taelin
